text: suno! yah tumhee log ho ki tumhen aamantran diya ja raha hai ki "allaah ke maarg mein kharch karo." phir tumase kuchh log hai jo kanjoosee karate hai. haalaanki jo kanjoosee karata hai vah vaastav mein apane aap hee se kanjoosee karata hai. allaah to nisprh hai, tumheen muhataaj ho. aur yadi tum phir jao to vah tumhaaree jagah any logon ko le aaega; phir ve tum jaise na honge
